https://tmrev.io/movie/82552-Armenia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s7UvKYgGlSgC0MVMVZ00gg405Hw.jpg This is a story about returning to ones ancestral homeland. Anna is a cardiologist who discovers her father has fled to his native Armenia after being diagnosed with a heart problem. Despite their contentious relationship, she sets out to bring her father back for this operation. Anna is a tough-minded, headstrong woman with little feeling for her fathers homeland or patience with its politics and socially intrusive culture, yet she finds this journey not only a reunion of sorts, but one of reconciliation as well. Armenia
